Package no.ntnu.idatt1005.plate.model

Class ShoppingList

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1005.plate.model.ShoppingList
public class ShoppingList extends Object
Class for managing SQL queries relating to the shopping list.

    • addItem

      public static void addItem(int ingredientId, float quantity)
      Add an item to the shopping list, or update the quantity if it already exists.
      Parameters:
      ingredientId - the ingredient id to look for and add.
      quantity - the quantity to add.

    • inShoppingList

      public static boolean inShoppingList(int ingredientId)
      Check whether the ingredient specified by the ID in question is in the shopping list.
      Parameters:
      ingredientId - the ingredient ID to check for.
      Returns:
      the boolean value of whether the ingredient is in the shopping list.

    • buyItems

      public static void buyItems(List<Integer> selectedItems) throws SQLException
      Buy items in the shopping list (move to inventory).
      Parameters:
      selectedItems - the selected items to be bought.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the SQL query fails (caught by the caller).

    • deleteItems

      public static void deleteItems(List<Integer> selectedItems) throws SQLException
      Delete items from the shopping list.
      Parameters:
      selectedItems - the items to delete.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the SQL query fails (caught by the caller).

    • selectAllMatchingIds

      public static ResultSet selectAllMatchingIds()
      Select all the items in the ingredient table that are in the shopping list.
      Returns:
      a ResultSet with the returned items.

    • deleteLessThanZero

      public static void deleteLessThanZero()
      Delete all items in the shopping list with a quantity less than or equal to zero.

    • selectAllItems

      public static ResultSet selectAllItems()
      Select all items in the shopping list.
      Returns:
      a ResultSet of all items in the shopping list.

    • getAllItems

      public static Map<Integer,String> getAllItems()
      Get all items in the shopping list in a hashmap. The key is the ingredient ID and the value is a string representation of the item
      Returns:
      a hashmap of all items in the shopping list

    • selectShoppingListItemFromId

      public static ResultSet selectShoppingListItemFromId(int ingredientId)
      Select a shopping list item from its ingredient ID.
      Parameters:
      ingredientId - the ID to select from.
      Returns:
      a ResultSet of the selected item.

    • updateShoppingListQuantity

      public static void updateShoppingListQuantity(int ingredientId, float quantity)
      Update the quantity of an item in the shopping list.
      Parameters:
      ingredientId - the ID of the ingredient to update.
      quantity - the quantity to update with.

      Insert an item into the shopping list.
      Parameters:
